title: Cheesecake Sticks
ingredients: 1 small cheesecake without crust (18 cm diameter)
instructions: 1. Cut the cheesecake into 8 pieces and insert a popsicle stick into each piece. 2. Melt the chocolate coating in a water bath and dip the cheesecake sticks into it to coat them. 3. Quickly decorate with fruits and sweets (such as chocolate bars, white chocolate bars, nut toffee balls, and Toffifee), let them dry, and refrigerate again.
